Mini-Mental State Examination (MMSE) sco: Riluzole continued at 50 mg BID for last 2 months.

MMSE score between 22 and 30: No gastrostomy tube (PEG) for feeding at screening
Mini-Mental State Examination (MMSE) sco: Patient feeds orally and does not use PEG tube.

MMSE score between 22 and 30: No tracheostomy or use of invasive ventilation at baseline
Mini-Mental State Examination (MMSE) sco: Patient breathes unassisted and has no tracheostomy.

MMSE score between 22 and 30: Women of childbearing potential must use effective contraception
Mini-Mental State Examination (MMSE) sco: Subject agreed to use hormonal contraception for duration of study.

MMSE score between 22 and 30: Negative pregnancy test before enrollment
Mini-Mental State Examination (MMSE) sco: Serum pregnancy test was negative at screening.

MMSE score between 22 and 30: Adequate liver and kidney function
Mini-Mental State Examination (MMSE) sco: Liver enzymes and serum creatinine within normal limits.

MMSE score between 22 and 30: No participation in another investigational drug trial within 30 days
Mini-Mental State Examination (MMSE) sco: Not currently or recently enrolled in any other trial.

MMSE score between 22 and 30: No history of other significant neurologic disorders (e.g., MS, PD)
Mini-Mental State Examination (MMSE) sco: Patient has no known history of Parkinson’s or multiple sclerosis.

MMSE score between 22 and 30: Willing and able to comply with all study procedures
Mini-Mental State Examination (MMSE) sco: Participant confirmed availability and willingness to attend all visits.

MMSE score between 22 and 30: Able to provide informed consent
Mini-Mental State Examination (MMSE) sco: Patient gave written informed consent before any study-related procedure.

MMSE score between 22 and 30: Confirmed genetic diagnosis of Huntington’s disease
Mini-Mental State Examination (MMSE) sco: Patient tested positive for expanded CAG repeat in HTT gene.

MMSE score between 22 and 30: Age 18 to 65 years
Mini-Mental State Examination (MMSE) sco: Patient is 44 years old and meets age requirement.

MMSE score between 22 and 30: Total Functional Capacity (TFC) score ≥ 7
Mini-Mental State Examination (MMSE) sco: TFC score assessed as 9 during screening visit.

MMSE score between 22 and 30: Unified Huntington's Disease Rating Scale (UHDRS) motor score >5
Mini-Mental State Examination (MMSE) sco: UHDRS motor exam total score recorded as 11.

MMSE score between 22 and 30: Able to ambulate independently
Mini-Mental State Examination (MMSE) sco: Patient can walk without assistive device.

MMSE score between 22 and 30: Able to swallow oral medication
Mini-Mental State Examination (MMSE) sco: Patient able to take pills without difficulty.

Mini-Mental State Examination (MMSE) sco: No recent use of risperidone, haloperidol, or experimental drugs.

Mini-Mental State Examination (MMSE) sco: ALT, AST, and creatinine were within normal range.
